Definition: Amateur sports or activities are done by people as a hobby and not as a job.
Cloze Test: ______ sports or activities are done by people as a hobby and not as a job.
Chinese Definition: 业余爱好者 | 业余的

Definition: An annual event happens once every year.
Cloze Test: An ______ event happens once every year.
Chinese Definition: 每年一次的 | 每年一次地 | 年度的 | 年度地 | 年鉴; 年刊 | 一年生植物

Definition: An arena is a large building with a big open area in the middle, used for sports events and other entertainments.
Cloze Test: An ______ is a large building with a big open area in the middle, used for sports events and other entertainments.
Chinese Definition: 竞技场 | 斗争场所

Definition: Artificial things are made or produced by people, often as a copy of something natural.
Cloze Test: ______ things are made or produced by people, often as a copy of something natural.
Chinese Definition: 人造的 (物体、材料、工艺等) | 人造地 | 人为的 (状态、状况) | 人为地

Definition: A cap is a limit that is set on an amount or number, especially an official one.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a limit that is set on an amount or number, especially an official one.
Chinese Definition: 软扁帽; 便帽 | 制服帽 | 瓶盖 | 成为…的结尾

Definition: A championship is a competition to find the best player or team in a particular sport or game.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a competition to find the best player or team in a particular sport or game.
Chinese Definition: 锦标赛 | 冠军称号

Definition: A crack is a line on the surface of something where it has split without breaking into separate parts.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a line on the surface of something where it has split without breaking into separate parts.
Chinese Definition: 使…破裂; 破裂 | 使…噼啪作响; 发出辟裂声 | 撞击 | 叩开 | 破解 (难题、密码) | 精神) 垮掉 | 嗓音) 突然变化 | 说 (笑话) | 裂缝 | 裂纹 | 缝隙 | 爆裂声 | 强效纯可卡因 | 训练有素的 | 挖苦人的) 笑话

Definition: Something that is crucial is extremely important or necessary.
Cloze Test: Something that is ______ is extremely important or necessary.
Chinese Definition: 至关重要的 | 至关重要地

Definition: Something that is curved has a smooth, rounded shape rather than straight sides.
Cloze Test: Something that is ______ has a smooth, rounded shape rather than straight sides.
Chinese Definition: 弧形的

Definition: A digit is a finger or toe.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a finger or toe.
Chinese Definition: 到9的任一) 数字

Definition: If you describe someone or something as engaging, you mean that they are attractive and interesting.
Cloze Test: If you describe someone or something as ______, you mean that they are attractive and interesting.
Chinese Definition: 迷人的

Definition: Something that is essential is extremely important or absolutely necessary.
Cloze Test: Something that is ______ is extremely important or absolutely necessary.
Chinese Definition: 至关重要的 | 必需品 | 基本的; 重要的 | 要素; 要点

Definition: An estimated amount or number is one that people calculate or guess to be correct.
Cloze Test: An ______ amount or number is one that people calculate or guess to be correct.
Chinese Definition: 估计 | 估计的 | 估计 | 判断 | 估价

Definition: Something that is fake is not genuine, but is made to look or seem genuine in order to deceive people.
Cloze Test: Something that is ______ is not genuine, but is made to look or seem genuine in order to deceive people.
Chinese Definition: adj. 伪造的，冒充的；（动作或感情）虚假的，做作的 | n. 假货，赝品；骗子，冒充者；假动作；（绳索、水龙带等的）一圈（=flake） | v. 伪造，冒充；假装，佯装；（尤指体育运动中）做假动作；不懂装懂，不会装会；盘卷（=flake） | 【名】 （Fake）（印）费克（人名）

Definition: If you fulfill a hope, wish, or aim, you achieve it or make it happen.
Cloze Test: If you ______ a hope, wish, or aim, you achieve it or make it happen.
Chinese Definition: vt. 履行；实现；满足；使结束（等于 fulfil）

Definition: A harness is a set of straps and fastenings used to control or hold in place a person, animal, or object.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a set of straps and fastenings used to control or hold in place a person, animal, or object.
Chinese Definition: 利用 | 背带; 安全带 | 马具; 挽具 | 给…套上挽具

Definition: If two things are identical, they are exactly the same.
Cloze Test: If two things are ______, they are exactly the same.
Chinese Definition: 完全相同的 | 完全相同地

Definition: If you investigate something, you examine it thoroughly in order to find out more about it.
Cloze Test: If you ______ something, you examine it thoroughly in order to find out more about it.
Chinese Definition: 调查 | 调查

Definition: You use literally to emphasize that what you are saying is true, even though it seems exaggerated or surprising.
Cloze Test: You use ______ to emphasize that what you are saying is true, even though it seems exaggerated or surprising.
Chinese Definition: 真地 | 确实地 | 字面上地

Definition: A lucrative activity, job, or business deal produces a lot of money.
Cloze Test: A ______ activity, job, or business deal produces a lot of money.
Chinese Definition: 获利丰厚的

Definition: Someone or something that is mellow is calm, peaceful, and easygoing.
Cloze Test: Someone or something that is ______ is calm, peaceful, and easygoing.
Chinese Definition: 柔和的 | 声音) 柔美的; (味道) 香醇的 | 使变平和; 变平和 | 平和的

Definition: A participant is a person who takes part in an activity or event.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a person who takes part in an activity or event.
Chinese Definition: 参加者

Definition: A perspective is a particular way of thinking about something, especially one that is influenced by your beliefs or experiences.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a particular way of thinking about something, especially one that is influenced by your beliefs or experiences.
Chinese Definition: 思维方式; 看法 | 看待事物) 正确/不正确地

Definition: If you describe something as prestigious, you mean that it is respected and admired.
Cloze Test: If you describe something as ______, you mean that it is respected and admired.
Chinese Definition: 有声望的

Definition: A pro is someone who plays a sport or does an activity as a job rather than for enjoyment.
Cloze Test: A ______ is someone who plays a sport or does an activity as a job rather than for enjoyment.
Chinese Definition: 专业人员 | 职业的 | 支持; 赞成 | 赞成的意见; 赞成的理由 | 利弊

Definition: A quarterfinal is one of the four matches or contests that are played to decide which players or teams will take part in the semifinals.
Cloze Test: A ______ is one of the four matches or contests that are played to decide which players or teams will take part in the semifinals.
Chinese Definition: adj. 四分之一决赛的 | n. 四分之一决赛

Definition: If you root for someone, you support or encourage them in a competitive situation.
Cloze Test: If you ______ someone, you support or encourage them in a competitive situation.
Chinese Definition: 支持；赞助；为……加油

Definition: A scanner is a device that can read or copy images or text and convert them into digital data.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a device that can read or copy images or text and convert them into digital data.
Chinese Definition: 扫描设备 | 扫描仪

Definition: A sequence is a set of events, actions, numbers, etc., which have a particular order and which lead to a particular result.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a set of events, actions, numbers, etc., which have a particular order and which lead to a particular result.
Chinese Definition: 一系列; 一连串 | 次序; 顺序

Definition: Something that is slippery is difficult to hold, walk on, or move on because it is smooth, wet, or oily.
Cloze Test: Something that is ______ is difficult to hold, walk on, or move on because it is smooth, wet, or oily.
Chinese Definition: 滑的; 湿滑的 | 狡猾的; 不可靠的 | 不断恶化的局势

Definition: If an amount or level soars, it increases very quickly.
Cloze Test: If an amount or level ______s, it increases very quickly.
Chinese Definition: 急剧增加 | 高飞

Definition: A sophisticated machine or system is very complex and works in a clever way.
Cloze Test: A ______ machine or system is very complex and works in a clever way.
Chinese Definition: 高级的; 复杂的 | 老练的; 久经世故的 | 干练的

Definition: Stability is the quality of being stable, or not likely to change or fail.
Cloze Test: ______ is the quality of being stable, or not likely to change or fail.
Chinese Definition: n. 稳定（性），稳固（性）；坚定，恒心

Definition: Stringent rules, laws, or conditions are very strict and must be obeyed.
Cloze Test: ______ rules, laws, or conditions are very strict and must be obeyed.
Chinese Definition: 法律、规定或条件) 严格的

Definition: A substance is a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas.
Chinese Definition: 物质 | 实质 | 要旨 | 正确性

Definition: Subtropical regions have a climate that is warm for most of the year, but not as hot as tropical regions.
Cloze Test: ______ regions have a climate that is warm for most of the year, but not as hot as tropical regions.
Chinese Definition: 亚热带的

Definition: Something that is unsustainable cannot continue at the same rate or level.
Cloze Test: Something that is ______ cannot continue at the same rate or level.
Chinese Definition: adj. 无法持续的；（生态）破坏生态平衡的，不可持续的；不能支持的，不能主张的

Definition: If something is varied, it consists of many different things or has many different aspects.
Cloze Test: If something is ______, it consists of many different things or has many different aspects.
Chinese Definition: 各种各样的

Definition: A violation of a law, rule, or agreement is an action that breaks it.
Cloze Test: A ______ of a law, rule, or agreement is an action that breaks it.
Chinese Definition:
n. （对法律、协议、原则等的）违背，违反；侵权行为，（对人权的）侵犯；
（对某物的）损毁，（对圣地的）亵渎；强奸

Definition: A workout is a period of physical exercise or training.
Cloze Test: A ______ is a period of physical exercise or training.
Chinese Definition: 体育锻炼; 体育训练
